info.name: WarehouseApp
info.description: This is a custom-built **Warehouse Management System** designed from scratch. It handles inventory management, user authentication, transactions, and unit measurements. The API uses token-based authentication (JWT) for secure access and includes dynamic routing for flexible operations.
